episodes.title: From Cult to Game Developer: The Story of St. Brides & The Silver Sisterhood Documentary
episodes.description:
Taking a dive into the murky waters of St. Brides, the kinky boarding school which grew from a feminist cult which took over from a bunch of people screaming in a garden. This is the tale of a very strange development house, making games that really couldn't have been made at any other time. This is the story of St. Brides, and it's a very, very weird one.

Want To Support The Channel? Well you're just lovely.
